World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 19 日星期一 15:25:11 GMT 120
Yemen's Houthis say ship attacked in Gulf of Aden may sinkYemen's Houthi militants said on Monday they had attacked another cargo vessel in the Gulf of Aden which was at risk of sinking, raising the stakes in their campaign to disrupt global shipping in solidarity with Palestinians in the Gaza war. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 14:36:52 GMT N5S5ISVHO5PARICFANMRUPUUPQ https://www.reuters.com/world/yemens-houthis-say-ship-attacked-gulf-aden-may-sink-2024-02-19/Ahmed Tolba, Jonathan Saul世界
Trump breaks silence on Navalny, casts no blame on PutinDonald Trump, who drew criticism as U.S. president for his praise of Russian leader Vladimir Putin, made his first public comment on the death of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny on Monday in a social media post that cast no blame. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 13:43:17 GMT OJDWJDFBVBOQRHM3M2GPVV4KBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us/trump-breaks-silence-navalny-casts-no-blame-putin-2024-02-19/Doina Chiacu世界美国
Britain's Rwanda asylum plan raises deep concerns: UN rights chiefBritain's revived plan to send asylum seekers to Rwanda would drastically strip back courts' ability to scrutinise decisions and risks dealing a "serious blow to human rights", the United Nations rights chief said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 13:30:26 GMT A4BNPDSPXBIV5LITFEOTTZQRCE https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/britains-rwanda-asylum-plan-raises-deep-concerns-un-rights-chief-2024-02-19/Reuters世界英国
Poland starts probe into allegations of illegal phone-hackingA Polish parliamentary commission on Monday began investigating accusations that the previous government illegally hacked the phones of targets including political opponents, amid a growing scandal over the use of Pegasus spyware. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 13:23:01 GMT SO7MHQJRNNIAFIHQ2JPDTKMVKI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/poland-starts-probe-into-allegations-illegal-phone-hacking-2024-02-19/Reuters世界欧洲
China coast guard boarded Taiwanese boat near frontline islands, Taiwan saysChinese coast guard personnel briefly boarded a Taiwanese tourist boat near Taiwan-controlled islands next to China's coast on Monday, the government in Taipei said, in an escalation of tensions after China said it would carry out regular patrols. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 13:16:54 GMT ZXNGETU6KJNVDOVINIBXVPNFXE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-coast-guard-boarded-taiwanese-boat-near-frontline-islands-taiwan-says-2024-02-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Spain to impose sanctions on violent Israeli settlers if no EU dealSpain will impose sanctions on violent Israeli settlers in the West Bank unilaterally if its European Union partners fail to reach an agreement on the issue, Foreign Minister Jose Manuel Albares said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 13:07:52 GMT MU6CZMV5TZIJZMPASYKBTMIWDI https://www.reuters.com/world/spain-impose-sanctions-violent-israeli-settlers-if-no-eu-deal-2024-02-19/Reuters世界
Dutch nationalist Wilders lashes out against Ukrainian refugeesDutch far right leader Geert Wilders, who won the most seats in an election three months ago but has so far failed to form a new coalition government, said on Monday the Netherlands was "Europe's fool" for accepting too many Ukrainian refugees. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 13:02:32 GMT 7XX3B4RQ3NP23IXO65Y3XAQPLE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dutch-nationalist-wilders-lashes-out-against-ukrainian-refugees-2024-02-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Strike closes Eiffel Tower in blow to tourists ahead of Paris OlympicsThe Eiffel Tower, one of the most visited tourist sites in the world, closed on Monday as staff went on strike in protest against the way the Paris monument is managed financially, disappointing the crowds below. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 12:58:34 GMT KRHZKHUKZVOPRCKZTKAYOB2NYU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/strike-closes-eiffel-tower-blow-tourists-ahead-paris-olympics-2024-02-19/Reuters商业工作世界
UN to explore appointment of envoy to engage Taliban with international communityThe United Nations secretary general will begin consultations on the appointment of a U.N. envoy to coordinate engagement between Afghanistan's Taliban government and the international community, he said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 12:44:43 GMT 4OQMQHBUWRILPP5X4VSBWKDW7E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/un-explore-appointment-envoy-engage-taliban-with-international-community-2024-02-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Parole for Thailand's Thaksin reflects rise of new threat to old guardThe early release of Thailand's once-fugitive ex-Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra represents to many a deal the influential billionaire made with his enemies to counter an even greater threat to the royalist-military establishment. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 12:37:47 GMT WBR2XSWIJBMTXILGUSM2FXL5I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/parole-thailands-thaksin-reflects-rise-new-threat-old-guard-2024-02-19/Panu Wongcha-Um, Kay Johnson世界亚太地区
Exclusive: Turkish-Russian trade hit by fresh US sanctions threatA U.S. threat to hit financial firms doing business with Russia with sanctions has chilled Turkish-Russian trade, disrupting or slowing some payments for both imported oil and Turkish exports, according to seven sources familiar with the matter. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 12:32:16 GMT ZK3X3G7YUNMSHH2ULPOLIWTM2M https://www.reuters.com/markets/turkish- Russian-trade-hit-by-fresh-us-sanctions-threat-2024-02-19/Can Sezer, Nevzat Devranoglu, Dmitry Zhdannikov市场
